imdb.plot outline: Tim Abell joins "The Federal Experience" as an accomplished Hollywood actor who wants to take his novice hunting skills to the next level. He'll learn about all the parts that go into a successful hunt-along with what occurs when things don't go perfectly. Viewers will also get a "behind the scenes" perspective into the overall experience of the hunt.
imdb.title: The Federal Experience

other companies.name: Marc Graue Recording Studios: Voiceover and Post

plot: Tim Abell joins "_The Federal Experience_ (qv)" as an accomplished Hollywood actor who wants to take his novice hunting skills to the next level.
